name: Reverse Adventure
description:
Reverse Adventure is a game in which you have to overcome levels using your puzzle solving and platforming skills. Use the buttons and the stopwatch (Rewind) to pass the game! This game has been created for the Brackeys Jam 2020.2 and the Rewind theme has greatly influinced on the proyect. 

For a better experience I recommend using the full screen mode!

Controls: Move with the arrows and shoot with the spacebar. Have fun!

Programming: David Huaraz (Construct 3)

- Channel about indie game development: Aquí David

- Itch.io page: Aquí David profile

Drawings and sprites: David Huaraz (Piskel)

Music: David Huaraz (Bosca Ceoil)

Thanks to the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2 and thanks to all my family!
